ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone. Recently I read a post online claiming that this
song does not last for a certain ticks like all our other buff songs do.
(For example, you can twist healing, jig, anthem on a good day without
losing any song effect) However, that person claims that the effect of
clarity kicks in whenever the message "your mind clears" is displayed and
as soon as you stop singing the song, it no longer helps mana regen. Can
anyone confirm this? I've always twisted clarity with healing to minimize
downtime, but if clarity does have this rather unique property, I might
have to change my tactics. I wonder why this song does not display an
icon like all our other buff songs do.
I would also love to find out whether clarity gives a
caster a certain amount of mana back per pulse or double his/her amount of
mana gained while medding. I have heard reports that multiple bards in a
party can all sing this song to super charge mana for casters. Does that
one instance of one bard song per party rule not aply to this song either?
